text: Khanapur is a town in Belgaum district, Karnataka, India. Khanapur may also refer to: *Khanapur, Chevella mandal, village and panchayat in Ranga Reddy district, Telangana, India *Khanapur, Manchal mandal, village and panchayat in Ranga Reddy district, Telangana, India *M.Khanapur, village in Belgaum district, Karnataka, India *U Khanapur, village in Belgaum district, Karnataka, India *Khanapur-M-Narendra, village in Dharwad district, Karnataka, India *Khanapur-M-Tadakod, village in Dharwad district, Karnataka, India *Khanapur (Vita), city and taluk in Sangli district, Maharashtra, India *Khanapur (Vidhan Sabha constituency), constituency in Maharashtra, India *Khanapur, Adilabad, mandal headquarters in Adilabad district, Telangana, India *Khanapur (Assembly constituency), constituency in Telangana, India ==See also== *Khanpur (disambiguation)
title: Khanapur (disambiguation)
